H5P Activities

The H5P Settings for Brightspace LTI Style Guide entry describes how to adjust H5P settings for graded activities.

Refer to this video tutorial to learn how to insert graded and ungraded H5P activities into an HTML page.

Use the "print" button at the top of the page to save your response. If you leave and return to this page, your response will not be visible. Don't worry! Your grade will still appear in the grade book.

Blank H5P Frame

Important: Use this example to copy/paste into your new page. It's more efficient to use this blank version because you can more easily replace the paragraph text with the new H5P object here than in the sample above.

Watch this video  to learn how best to insert an H5P object into this frame.

INSERT_H5P_ACTIVITY_HERE

Use the "print" button at the top of the page to save your response. If you leave and return to this page, your response will not be visible. Don't worry! Your grade will still appear in the grade book.
